name: escalando-fronteras-frontend
description: Static website for Escalando Fronteras organization

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r css dist/ && cp -r fonts dist/ && cp -r images dist/ && cp -r js dist/ && cp *.html dist/ && cp -r dist public
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css css/style.css && cp dist/css/style.min.css public/css/
scripts.minify-js: terser js/custom.js js/click-scroll.js js/counter.js js/faq.js js/youtube.js -o dist/js/app.min.js && cp dist/js/app.min.js public/js/

author: Enrique Macías López
